betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§6§6§3Redstone-Over Radio§r in combination with a §3Redstone Fluid Valve§r can be used to detect when a tank is starting to fill up, and release the insides. This is useful for having buffers without having all the fluids being wasted.

§2Here is an exmaple of a tank that will only output fluid once its full:§r

Firstly, place a §6ROR Transmitter§r on one port of the tank, provide an ID and enable Polling.

[img height=1000]betterquesting:textures/QB_Fluid1.png[/img]

After that, place a §6ROR Logic Receiver§r next to the fluid valve and input the desired settings. Make sure that your signal is >= of your desired buffer. One redstone level equals to 16k mb.

[img height=1000]betterquesting:textures/QB_Fluid2.png[/img]

A §3Fluid Control Pump§r can also be used to limit throughput of fluids and to also add priorities.
